name: part_006
file: tmp_【 #アキロゼ生誕祭2024 】ーFantasia of Bremenー￤3DLIVE【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [pFZiKpoxuvw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental transition as the stage curtains close.
MC section introducing the guest unit for the 'Bremen Music Festival'.

subtitles.original: 照らしている
subtitles.english: ...shining down.

subtitles.original: どうせ私は 出来損ないで
subtitles.english: After all, I'm just a failure,

subtitles.original: どうしようもなくて
subtitles.english: and there's nothing I can do.

subtitles.original: 夜明け夢見ては
subtitles.english: I dream of the dawn

subtitles.original: 地べた這いずり回る
subtitles.english: while crawling on the ground.

subtitles.original: それでも誰かに 見つけて欲しくて
subtitles.english: But still, I want someone to find me,

subtitles.original: 夜空見上げて叫んでいる
subtitles.english: so I'm looking up and shouting at the night sky.

subtitles.original: 逃げ出したいや 逃げ出せない
subtitles.english: I want to run away, but I can't;

subtitles.original: 明るい未来は見えない
subtitles.english: I can't see a bright future.

subtitles.original: ねえ それでもあなたに
subtitles.english: Hey, I still want you

subtitles.original: 見つけて欲しくて 蝶のように舞い上がるの
subtitles.english: to find me, so I'll soar like a butterfly.

subtitles.original: 欠けた翼で飛ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll fly with these broken wings,

subtitles.original: 醜い星の子 ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: the crescent moon, child of an ugly star.

subtitles.original: 今宵も月は 綺麗な満月じゃないけど
subtitles.english: The moon tonight isn't a beautiful full moon,

subtitles.original: 誰かの腕に 抱かれて眠っている
subtitles.english: but it's sleeping, held in someone's arms.

subtitles.original: どうせ私は 一人の夜に
subtitles.english: After all, I'm crushed by the lonely nights,

subtitles.original: 押し潰されては
subtitles.english: shattered by the solitude,

subtitles.original: 誰にも見えない 夜闇這いずり回る
subtitles.english: crawling through the darkness, invisible to all.

subtitles.original: それでも誰にも 負けたくなくて
subtitles.english: But still, I don't want to lose to anyone,

subtitles.original: 夢中で爪も掻いている
subtitles.english: so I'm desperately clawing my way through.

subtitles.original: 追いつきたいや 追い越したいや 夢に見たような世界
subtitles.english: I want to catch up, I want to overtake, into the world I've seen in my dreams.

subtitles.original: ねえ それでも誰かと 比べてばっかり
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm still just constantly comparing myself,

subtitles.original: 周りを見ては立ち止まって
subtitles.english: stopping as I look at those around me.

subtitles.original: 欠けたものを探した
subtitles.english: I searched for what was missing;

subtitles.original: そんな自分を変えたい
subtitles.english: I want to change that part of myself.

subtitles.original: それでもあなたと 同じ景色が また見たいから
subtitles.english: But still, I want to see that same view with you again.

subtitles.original: 泣き出したくても 投げ出したくても
subtitles.english: Even if I want to cry, even if I want to give up,

subtitles.original: 諦めたりはできない
subtitles.english: I can't bring myself to quit.

subtitles.original: それでもあなたに 見つかるように
subtitles.english: But still, so that you'll find me,

subtitles.original: 蛹は強く手を伸ばすの
subtitles.english: this chrysalis is reaching out its hands.

subtitles.original: 欠けたもの抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embracing what's broken,

subtitles.original: 願いを放つよ ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: I'll release my wish, the crescent moon.

subtitles.original: それでも誰かに 見つけて欲しくて
subtitles.english: But still, I want someone to find me,

subtitles.original: 夜空見上げて叫んでいる
subtitles.english: so I'm looking up and shouting at the night sky.

subtitles.original: 泣き出したいけど 泣き出さない
subtitles.english: I want to cry, but I won't cry;

subtitles.original: もう後戻りなどできない
subtitles.english: there's no turning back now.

subtitles.original: ねえ それでもあなたに 見つけて欲しくて
subtitles.english: Hey, I still want you to find me,

subtitles.original: 蝶のように舞い上がるの
subtitles.english: so I'll soar like a butterfly.

subtitles.original: 欠けた翼で飛ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll fly with these broken wings,

subtitles.original: 醜い星の子 ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: the crescent moon, child of an ugly star.

subtitles.original: 光を放つよ ミカヅキ
subtitles.english: I'll release my light, the crescent moon.

subtitles.original: 今宵も月は 綺麗な満月がキラキラ
subtitles.english: The moon tonight is a beautiful full moon, sparkling bright.

subtitles.original: 次は君の番だと
subtitles.english: Telling me it's your turn next,

subtitles.original: 笑っている
subtitles.english: as it smiles down.

subtitles.original: Welcome to Bremen Music Festival!!
subtitles.english: Welcome to Bremen Music Festival!!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったパーティーも いよいよクライマックス
subtitles.english: This fun party is finally reaching its climax.

subtitles.original: 次は 飛び入り参加の 異色のユニットが登場です！
subtitles.english: Next up, a unique unit of surprise guests will appear!

subtitles.original: 石油の国のプリンセス ロバ
subtitles.english: The Princess of the oil country: Donkey!

subtitles.original: 大地を揺らすミラクルボイス イヌ
subtitles.english: The miracle voice that shakes the earth: Dog!

subtitles.original: 空想世界の探求者 ネコ
subtitles.english: The explorer of the imaginary world: Cat!

subtitles.original: オレの音楽を聴け！ ニワトリ
subtitles.english: Listen to my music! Chicken!

subtitles.original: 心優しきイリュージョニスト ドロボウ
subtitles.english: The kind-hearted illusionist: Thief!
